Alg-Syst-GrSys-MethOr-SectEx1: %# Database File : Alg-Syst-GrSys-MethOr-SectEx1\qt_endl%@ Database source: b_lykeiou\qt_endlΝα λυθούν τα παρακάτω συστήματα με τη μέθοδο των οριζουσών\qt_endl\begin{multicols}{2}\qt_endl\begin{alist}\qt_endl\item $ \ccases{\left(\sqrt{2}+1\right)x+\sqrt{2}y=1-\sqrt{2}\\\sqrt{2}x+\left(\sqrt{2}-1\right)y=2-\sqrt{2}} $\qt_endl\end{alist}\qt_endl\item $ \ccases{\sqrt{8}x+\sqrt{12}y=-2\\\sqrt{3}x-\sqrt{2}y=\sqrt{24}} $\qt_endl\end{multicols}\qt_endl%# End of file Alg-Syst-GrSys-MethOr-SectEx1
